title: Leaving match
body:
Hi there! i want to ask u a question.Its about leaving matches.
I started like a noob as usual and i quit i get 5 minutes to stay on lobby k.
And when the bann finished i finish my gameplay and when i come back from the match (i finished it) it gives me again 5 minutes to stay help me pls!!!!

replies.body: An account will receive a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) after multiple leaves or interruptions.  Even if you returned to the game, that's still a period of time that your teammates were down a player.  The best way to recover from this is by resolving whatever is causing you to leave and stay in game.  Best of luck!
